sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: S&P 500 Rises 0.5%; Crude Oil Falls Sharply - Adamis Pharmaceuticals  ( NASDAQ:ADMP ) , Evaxion Biotech  ( NASDAQ:EVAX )
feed.summary: U.S. stocks traded higher midway through trading, with the Dow Jones gaining more than 100 points on Wednesday. The Dow traded up 0.40% to 30,829.94 while the NASDAQ rose 0.31% to 11,460.00. The S&P 500 also rose, gaining, 0.50% to 3,875.30.

feed.title: US Stocks Open Higher Ahead Of Fed Decision, Dow Jumps 175 Points - DarioHealth  ( NASDAQ:DRIO ) , American States Water  ( NYSE:AWR )
feed.summary: U.S. stocks traded higher this morning, with the Dow Jones gaining around 175 points on Wednesday. The Federal Reserve will announce its policy decision at 2:00 p.m. ET. The country's central bank is widely expected to raise interest rates by 75 bps at the meeting.

feed.title: Special Situation Alert: This Infrastructure Company Just Doubled Your Profit Potential
feed.summary: If you've been with me for a while, you know I'm looking for special situations plays, like spin-offs, for one. These events are where a company divides a piece or pieces of its business up into separate companies.
